Package noppes.npcs.api.event

Class PlayerEvent.DiedEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
noppes.npcs.api.event.CustomNPCsEvent
noppes.npcs.api.event.PlayerEvent
noppes.npcs.api.event.PlayerEvent.DiedEvent
Enclosing class:
PlayerEvent
public static class PlayerEvent.DiedEvent extends PlayerEvent

Hook function name: died
Triggered when the player dies.

This event is cancelable, but canceling this event has no effect.

Since:
1.10.2(21jul17), 1.11.2(29oct17)

  • Field Details

    • damageSource

      public final IDamageSource damageSource

      The damage source that causes the death.

      Prior to 1.11.2(29oct17), this field is named mcDamageSource, and the type of this field is net.minecraft.util.DamageSource (refactored to DamageSource.)

    • type

      public final String type

      The type of the damage source that causes the death.

      Identical to the value returned by calling IDamageSource.getType() on damageSource.

    • source

      public final IEntity source

      The ultimate source entity of the damage that causes the death.

      For an indirect damage, this is the indirect source of the damage.

  • Constructor Details

    • DiedEvent

      public DiedEvent(IPlayer player, DamageSource damagesource, Entity entity)

      Creates an instance of the PlayerEvent.DiedEvent class.

      Scripters should not use this constructor.
